cause.description:
There are thousands of people in need of a kidney transplant. In Canada and the U.S. alone the numbers are staggering, please visit www.kidney.ca and www.kidney.org and www.livingdonorsonline.org to find out more. I have always been a big supporter of organ donation, but last year it touched me personally when I donated a kidney to my father. I watched him get his life back and have since been doing what I can to educate and inform by sharing my experience. You can save a life by giving a piece of yourself. Whether you are a living donor, or choose to donate your organs by becoming a registered donor, organ donation is the greatest gift you can give. Donate life.
Please invite others to join in the cause, lets make a difference!!
1. Opening eyes to the number of people in need
2. Educate and inform people on what they can do
3. Share individual stories of Living Donors.
cause.mission: Open eyes and hearts to Organ Donation in general, and specifically Kidney Donation.
cause.name: Kidney Donation
